title: A guy goes AFK in my ranked match and I lose 24 LP for it.

replies.body:
Welcome to league of legends get used to it cause your going to want to put this same post in the forums every single time you try to play ranked games. 

Riot claimed they put something in to stop this but again I have seen first hand that they just claimed to have put system in place against trolls and afks.
Yet I have done the reporting about 30 times now and still have yet to see anything on my screen that says a player was punished. 

So basically they just "Claimed" that so that players would stop complaining about it for a month or two.

Happened to me last weekend. Had 2 ppl on my team, in the same game, that were afk. So it was a 3v5 and obviously we lost. I then lost 17 LP for it. How should i be punished by losing LP for something someone else did? And the best part is, while those of us that stick it out and honorably surrender, lose LP for it....the people who actually go afk and ruin the game get away and never receive punishment.
